subject: Re: Declaring constants in perl
body:
On Jun 8, 2007, at 1:33 PM, Nath, Alok (STSD) wrote:

> Hi,
> 	What is the convention used to declare constants in perl ?
> 	In C we declare constant type in Capital letters , not sure
> 	how its in perl.

Same convention:

   use constant FOO => 3;
